languages.text: "Если нужно оборвать нить жизни быстро — цельтесь в шею. Если жертва заслуживает наказания перед смертью — вскройте брюхо".

traits.locale_text: "Если вам нужно оборвать нить жизни быстро — цельтесь в шею. Если жертва заслуживает наказания перед смертью — вспрорите ей брюхо".

languages.text: "If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."
languages.original_text: "Если нужно оборвать нить жизни быстро — цельтесь в шею. Если жертва заслуживает наказания перед смертью — вскройте брюхо".

traits.locale_text: "If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."
"If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."
"If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."
"If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."
"If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."
"If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."

languages.text: « Quand il est question de trancher rapidement le fil de la vie, il convient de viser la nuque. Quand des tourments s'imposent, au contraire, c'est le ventre qu'il faut entailler. »
languages.original_text: "If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."

traits.locale_text: « Quand il est question de trancher rapidement le fil de la vie, il convient de viser la nuque. Quand des tourments s'imposent, au contraire, c'est le ventre qu'il faut entailler. »

languages.text: «Si alguna vez tiene que cortar el hilo de la vida con rapidez, vaya a por el cuello. Si la marca merece sufrimiento antes de morir, ábrale en canal».
languages.original_text: "If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."

traits.locale_text: «Si alguna vez tiene que cortar el hilo de la vida con rapidez, vaya a por el cuello. Si la marca merece sufrimiento antes de morir, ábrale en canal».

languages.text: 「命の糸を早く断ち切る必要があるなら、首を狙え。死ぬ前に苦しむべき標的なら、腹を切り開くんだ」
languages.original_text: "If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."

traits.locale_text: 「命の糸を早く断ち切る必要があるなら、首を狙え。死ぬ前に苦しむべき標的なら、腹を切り開くんだ」

languages.text: “如果你打算快速切断丝线，那就瞄准猎物的脖子；如果你打算让对方死前尽可能地受苦，那就剖开他们的肚子。”
languages.original_text: "If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."

traits.locale_text: “如果你打算快速切断丝线，那就瞄准猎物的脖子；如果你打算让对方死前尽可能地受苦，那就剖开他们的肚子。”

languages.text: "Wenn Ihr den Faden des Lebens schnell durchtrennen müsst, zielt auf den Hals. Wenn das Opfer vor dem Tod zu leiden verdient hat, schlitzt ihm den Bauch auf."
languages.original_text: "If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."

traits.locale_text: "Wenn Ihr den Faden des Lebens schnell durchtrennen müsst, zielt auf den Hals. Wenn das Opfer vor dem Tod zu leiden verdient hat, schlitzt ihm den Bauch auf."

languages.text: "Hayatın ipliğini çabucak koparmak istiyorsan boyna hedef al. Hedefinin ölmeden önce acı çekmesi gerekiyorsa karnını deş."
languages.original_text: "If you have to sever the thread of life quickly, aim for the neck. If the mark deserves to suffer before they die, open their belly."
